title: Samsung Smart Remote Setup
multi_remote_prompt: Do you use more than one remote to control this TV setup (e.g., one for TV power, another for cable/sound)?
ai_context_notes: This setup may involve two remotes. Remote A is the primary Samsung remote for power and navigation. Remote B is a secondary remote for channels and volume. Always clarify which remote the user should be using.

buttons.name: Power
buttons.function: Turns the TV on or off.

buttons.name: Navigation Ring
buttons.function: Navigates menus (up, down, left, right). Press center to select.

steps.title: Power On TV (Remote A)
steps.description: Point the Samsung remote (Remote A) at the TV. Press the Power (⏻) button once. The TV screen should light up.

steps.title: Navigate to App or Input (Remote A)
steps.description: Use the Navigation Ring (○) on Remote A to move between apps like Netflix or inputs like HDMI 1. Press the center of the ring to select.

steps.title: Control Volume (Remote B)
steps.description: Use the secondary remote (Remote B) for audio. Press the Volume (+/-) button to increase or decrease the sound.

steps.title: Change Channels (Remote B)
steps.description: If watching cable, use the Channel (CH) button on Remote B to switch between channels.
